SEARCH
Package src.account

Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
src.account.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
The AccountManager class is responsible for managing the various types of accounts in the system. It provides methods for logging in and retrieving account information.

    • loginFypCoordinatorAccount

      public static FYPCoordinatorAccount loginFypCoordinatorAccount(String loginId, String password)
      Attempts to log in a FYP Coordinator account with the given login ID and password.
      Parameters:
      loginId - the login ID of the account
      password - the password of the account
      Returns:
      the logged in FYP Coordinator account, or null if the account does not exist or the password is incorrect

    • setStudentStatus

      public static void setStudentStatus(String studentID, StudentStatus studentStatus, int fypID)
      Sets the status and assigned FYP project ID of the student account with the given student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the student ID of the account
      studentStatus - the new status of the student account
      fypID - the ID of the FYP project assigned to the student account
